welcome_message_body: Welcome to Matosinhos, a charming fishing town known for its beautiful beaches, fresh seafood, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this picturesque city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Temaki D'lux Sushi

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Braga Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
